Package it.unipd.dei.se.faderic.analyze

Class SynonymPOSAnalyzer

java.lang.Object
org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer
it.unipd.dei.se.faderic.analyze.SynonymPOSAnalyzer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable
public class SynonymPOSAnalyzer extends org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer
The SynonymPOSAnalyzer class is a Java class that extends the Analyzer class and uses OpenNLP OpenNLPTokenizer and OpenNLPPOSFilter to analyze text and also includes a custom synonym filter.

  • Method Details

    • createComponents

      protected org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer.TokenStreamComponents createComponents(String fieldName)
      This function creates a token stream with OpenNLP tokenizer, POS filter, and synonym filter.
      Specified by:
      createComponents in class org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer
      Parameters:
      fieldName - The name of the field being analyzed.
      Returns:
      The method createComponents returns a TokenStreamComponents object, which contains the tokenizer and token filters used for analyzing text in a specific field.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException
      Main method of the class. Just for testing purposes.
      Parameters:
      args - command line arguments.
      Throws:
      IOException - if something goes wrong while processing the text.
